original_text: They were greatly disturbed because the apostles were teaching the people, proclaiming in Jesus the resurrection of the dead.
korean_text: 예수 안에 죽은 자의 부활이 있다고 백성을 가르치고 전함을 싫어하여

sentences.original_text: because the apostles were teaching the people
proclaiming in Jesus the resurrection of the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 예수 안에서 죽은 자의 부활을 전파하며
